conversion_verification.notes: Successful isometric cutaway conversion with clear wall geometry and internal volumes.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Clean 3D geometry and excellent cutaway execution; minor perspective flare on outer walls.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Layout matches closely. Added windows on left wall which were not in 2D plan; balcony railing style changed.

interior_elements.notes: Furniture placement is highly accurate to 2D reference, including kitchen appliances and bedroom desk.

visual_clarity.notes: High contrast and clean rendering; lighting enhances readability. No UI elements present.

detected_errors.description: Additional windows added to the left-side living room wall not specified in the original floor plan.

summary: An exceptional 3D conversion that maintains high spatial fidelity to the original floor plan with professional-grade rendering.
